channel.title: Tops on Oddly Specific
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Oddly Specific

item.description: About this Blog Welcome to my GitHub pages! Here you will find links to R coding tips, tutorials, and in-depth walk-throughs of the data science I am using in my current research collaborations. I hope this will be useful to others in at least two respects: For those interested in reproducing research that has been published, you will find the exact code that I used in my data analysis.
